content: this is really easy and quick this fits my 4 year old with a little room for stretching 20 1/2 inch head but is easily adjustable by either changing hook size or adding increase row here is the german translation 1 thank you melanie http //nomimikry blogspot com/2010/08/olivias-butterfly-free-pattern-in html french translation http //aufildesenvies blogspot com/2009/11/modele-gratuit-olivias-butterfly html italian translation http //martaknitting blogspot it/2012/06/olivas-butterfly html 1 http //nomimikry blogspot com/2010/08/olivias-butterfly-free-pattern-in html
